title: Planting Material, other than Seed) Regulations 2014 (S.I. 152 of 2014) are
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities 
(Marketing of Vegetable Propagating and Planting Material, other than Seed) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2025.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european community (marketing vegetable propagating planting material seed) (amendment) regulation 2025

title: Planting Material, other than Seed) Regulations 2014 (S.I. 152 of 2014) are
heading: 2. The European Communities (Marketing of Vegetable Propagating and
text_raw:
2. The European Communities (Marketing of Vegetable Propagating and 
Planting Material, other than Seed) Regulations 2014 (S.I. 152 of 2014) are 
amended in Regulation 2(1) by substituting for the definition of “Directive” (as 
amended by the European Communities (Marketing of Vegetable Propagating 
and Plant Material, other than Seed) (Amendment) (No.2) Regulations 2020 (S.I. 
No. 200 of 2020)), the following – 

“‘Directive’ means Council Directive No. 2008/72/EC of 15th July 20082 (as 
amended by Commission Implementing Decision 2013/166/EU of 2 April 
20133, Commission Implementing Directive 2013/45/EU of 7th August 20134 
and Commission Implementing Directive (EU) 2019/990 of 17 June 2019)5, 
Commission Directive 93/61/EEC of 2 July 19935 (as amended by Commission 
Implementing Directive (EU) 2020/177 of 11 February 2020) and Commission 
Implementing Directive (EU) 2024/3010 of 29th November 2024;”.

title: Planting Material, other than Seed) Regulations 2014 (S.I. 152 of 2014) are
heading: 3. The European Communities (Marketing of Vegetable Propagating and
text_raw:
3. The European Communities (Marketing of Vegetable Propagating and 
Plant Material, other than Seed) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2020 (S.I. 
No. 200 of 2020) are revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

15 April, 2025. 

MARTIN HEYDON, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

1 OJ L EN L Series, 29.11.2024, P.1 
2 OJ L205, 01.08.2008 P.28

"Iris Oifigiúil" of 22nd April, 2025.

title: Planting Material, other than Seed) Regulations 2014 (S.I. 152 of 2014) are
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations give effect to the provisions of Commission Implementing 
Directive (EU) 2024/3010 by amending the Directive as they relate to 
inspections for Union regulated non-quarantine pests (RNQPs) and measures 
intended to prevent their presence on vegetable propagating and planting 
material other than seed for planting. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [139]
